mapper.update: UPDATE MESSENGER SET DELETE_TF = 'Y' WHERE MESSENGER_ENROLL_DT < SYSDATE - 7 AND DELETE_TF = 'N'

UPDATE RESIDENTS_MEETING SET MEETING_STATUS = 1 WHERE TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(MEETING_DT, 'RRRR/MM/DD'),'RRRR/MM/DD') < TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'RRRR/MM/DD'),'RRRR/MM/DD') OR (TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(MEETING_DT, 'RRRR/MM/DD'),'RRRR/MM/DD') = TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'RRRR/MM/DD'),'RRRR/MM/DD') AND TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH:MI'),'HH24:MI') < TO_DATE(SUBSTR(MEETING_TM, 0, 5),'HH24:MI'))

UPDATE RESIDENTS_MEETING SET MEETING_STATUS = 2 WHERE TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(MEETING_DT, 'RRRR/MM/DD'),'RRRR/MM/DD') = TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'RRRR/MM/DD'),'RRRR/MM/DD') AND TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH:MI'),'HH24:MI') > TO_DATE(SUBSTR(MEETING_TM, 0, 5),'HH24:MI') AND TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH:MI'),'HH24:MI') < TO_DATE(SUBSTR(MEETING_TM, 7),'HH24:MI')

UPDATE RESIDENTS_MEETING SET MEETING_STATUS = 3 WHERE TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(MEETING_DT, 'RRRR/MM/DD'),'RRRR/MM/DD') = TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'RRRR/MM/DD'),'RRRR/MM/DD') AND TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH:MI'),'HH24:MI') < TO_DATE(SUBSTR(MEETING_TM, 0, 5),'HH24:MI') OR (TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH:MI'),'HH24:MI') = TO_DATE(SUBSTR(MEETING_TM, 0, 5),'HH24:MI') AND TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH:MI'),'HH24:MI') > TO_DATE(SUBSTR(MEETING_TM, 7),'HH24:MI'))
UPDATE SURVEY SET SURVEY_STATUS = 1 WHERE TO_DATE(SUBSTR(SURVEY_PERIOD, 0, 10),'RRRR/MM/DD') > TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'RRRR/MM/DD'),'RRRR/MM/DD')

UPDATE SURVEY SET SURVEY_STATUS = 2 WHERE TO_DATE(SUBSTR(SURVEY_PERIOD, 15),'RRRR/MM/DD') >= TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'RRRR/MM/DD'),'RRRR/MM/DD') AND TO_DATE(SUBSTR(SURVEY_PERIOD, 0, 10),'RRRR/MM/DD') <= TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'RRRR/MM/DD'),'RRRR/MM/DD')
UPDATE SURVEY SET SURVEY_STATUS = 3 WHERE TO_DATE(SUBSTR(SURVEY_PERIOD, 15),'RRRR/MM/DD') < TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'RRRR/MM/DD'),'RRRR/MM/DD')
